title: Easy Peasy CBC Materials
description: The app makes it easy to find and download CBC print-ready materials

title: Higher Level of Learning
description: Climb to higher levels of learning with well curated content on the app

title: Incorporating Content from Books and the Web
description: The curated content offer a mix of both book materials and web materials for students to learn from

title: No more headaches
description: Now you no longer need to use a lot of resources to research CBC materials as all the requires content has been researched for you

title: Get Started
description: Get started with the app and start downloading curated CBC materials
